hero.description: OnPharma works professionally to enhance the quality of our products, keeping pace with rapid changes in local and international markets. We always strive to excel in serving our customers and suppliers.

products.title: Our Products
products.orderDescription: Please Contact Us To Order The Product

products.name: Onetoly Gel
products.description: Gel Promotes Skin Regeneration, Hydration, and Improves Skin Texture.
products.ingredients: Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Menthol, Lauryl Glucoside, Melaleuca Alternifolia Leaf Oil(Tea Tree Oil), Chlorhexidine Digluconate, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract(Chamomile Extract), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract(Marigold Extract), Thymus Vulgaris Extract, Citric Acid, Disodium Edta, Parfum, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Ci 17200, Aqua
products.application: Take An Amount Of The Wash On The Palm Of The Hand And Apply It To The Desired Area. Use It Directly Without Diluting It, Then Rinse It With Warm Water. Repeat As Needed.

products.name: Onetoly Wash
products.description: Tea tree oil Gives a distinctive scent and helps maintain everyday freshness.
products.ingredients: Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Menthol, Lauryl Glucoside, Melaleuca Alternifolia Leaf Oil(Tea Tree Oil), Chlorhexidine Digluconate, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract(Chamomile Extract), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract(Marigold Extract), Thymus Vulgaris Extract, Citric Acid, Disodium Edta, Parfum, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Ci 17200, Aqua
products.application: Take An Amount Of The Wash On The Palm Of The Hand And Apply It To The Desired Area. Use It Directly Without Diluting It, Then Rinse It With Warm Water. Repeat As Needed.

goals: To acquire and maintain global leadership position in chosen areas of businesses
To continuously create new opportunities for growth in our strategic businesses
To be among the top 10 most admired companies to work for
To continuously achieve a return on invested capital of at least 10 points higher than the cost of capital
vision: We will, with utmost care for the environment and society, continue to enhance value for our customers by providing innovative products and economically efficient solutions
and for our stakeholders through growth, cost-effectiveness, and wise investment of resources.
